en.hero_title: Transform your life with AGDC Fitness
en.hero_text: Personalized training to reach your goals.
en.about_hero_text: My story, experience and passion for fitness
en.about_p1: I'm Arturo Gal√°n del Coso, a personal trainer with years of experience helping people transform their bodies and lives.
en.about_p2: Certified in functional training, sports nutrition and physical preparation, my goal is to provide you with a plan tailored to your needs.
en.about_p3: I believe in consistency, discipline and customizing every workout to achieve the best results. My mission is to help you reach your goals in a healthy and effective way.
en.services_hero_text: Training tailored to your goals and lifestyle
en.services_training_desc:
Do you want to lose weight, gain muscle, or simply feel better? I design fully personalized routines tailored to your goals: fat loss, muscle gain, toning, or performance improvement.

‚ùñ Initial assessment of your physical condition and experience level.
‚ùñ Plans adapted to beginner, intermediate, or advanced.
‚ùñ Progressive focus to avoid plateaus and injuries.
‚ùñ Routines adjusted to your schedule, fitness level, and available equipment (gym or home).

üëâ Your goal is mine. Let's achieve it together!
en.services_online_desc:
Train from anywhere or in person, with the same commitment. I offer individual or group sessions both online and in person (locally), combining professionalism and flexibility.

‚ùñ Online: video calls via Zoom, WhatsApp or Meet.
‚ùñ In-person: workouts in parks, homes, or sports centers (local area).
‚ùñ Continuous support and weekly follow-up.

üîÅ With technique correction, constant motivation, and real-time adaptation.
en.services_massage_desc:
Recover your body, prevent injuries, and perform better. Sports massage is the perfect complement to intense training.

‚ùñ Relieves post-workout muscle soreness.
‚ùñ Improves circulation, mobility, and recovery.
‚ùñ Ideal for athletes or anyone with postural discomfort.
‚ùñ Available as individual sessions or combined with your training plan.

üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Take care of your body. It's your lifelong companion.
